com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.util

Class DelegatingMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex.addons.util.DelegatingMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnStreamMatcher, MatchResult
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TokensMatcher

    public class DelegatingMatcher
extends Object
implements OnStreamMatcher
    This OnStreamMatcher delegates to another matcher.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    rwoo

      • findUnlessHitEnd

        public boolean findUnlessHitEnd(int minFrom,
                                int maxFrom)
        Description copied from interface: OnStreamMatcher
        Looks for the first position that could be the start of a match that starts in the range [ from (including), maxFrom (including)]. If such a position is found, then the method stops and returns true if the input provides enough characters to make a match.

        ATTENTION! maxFrom can be the position behind(!) the last character of the input.

        This first position can retrieved via OnStreamMatcher.lastFrom().

        Specified by:
        findUnlessHitEnd in interface OnStreamMatcher
        Returns:
        Returns true if the method found a match at the position OnStreamMatcher.lastFrom().

      • hitEnd

        public boolean hitEnd()

        public boolean requireEnd()
        Specified by:

      • lastFrom

        public int lastFrom()
        Description copied from interface: OnStreamMatcher
        This property is set by calling OnStreamMatcher.findUnlessHitEnd(int, int) .

        ATTENTION! This property returns maxFrom + 1, if OnStreamMatcher.findUnlessHitEnd(int, int) neither has found a match nor has hit the end of input as long it looked for matches that started somewhere in the interval [minFrom, maxFrom].

        ATTENTION! This information is not really helpful when the buffer size is equal to maxFrom. In this case you cannot say whether the position of lastFrom is the start of a potential match or not.

        Specified by:
        lastFrom in interface OnStreamMatcher
        Returns:
        Returns the last position OnStreamMatcher.findUnlessHitEnd(int, int) has investigated before it returned.
